description: This file defines a scaffold class NotificationService for managing push notification enablement status, with placeholders for future integration with Firebase Cloud Messaging and local notifications.

classes.name: NotificationService
classes.description: Provides hooks for enabling and disabling push notifications with no-op implementations, serving as a scaffold for future integration.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Placeholder for initializing notification services such as Firebase Messaging and local notifications.

methods.name: enableNotifications
methods.description: Enables push notifications by setting internal flag to true.

methods.name: disableNotifications
methods.description: Disables push notifications by setting internal flag to false.

methods.name: isEnabled
methods.description: Getter that returns whether notifications are currently enabled.
